description:
Welcome to the best guide for making yourself an NFL Daily Fantasy Sports (DFS) expert. By taking this course you will be armed with the best tools, strategies and weekly sleeper picks to make sure you're in the money every week this NFL season! I will walk you through different roster construction basics, advanced methods for picking sleepers, and the terminology you need to know for the rest of your DFS career. Here are a few things you'll get from this course

  1. My weekly NFL sleepers list (this alone is worth the price)
  2. Roster construction techniques for tournaments and cash games
  3. Key terminology so you can better navigate other DFS resources
  4. Metrics to help you evaluate different players.

This course will be video based and I promise to keep it interesting. No boring monologues, no rote memorization, no endless spread sheets. You'll come out of this course a researching, dominating DFS machine!
title: Daily Fantasy Football Pro Course: Earn Cash Now!
